effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: A puddle of blight—digested soul juice—covers the ground in the target's square, which is affected as if by Seeping Blight (see the Level 7+ Demon Malice feature).

effects.name: Special
effects.effect: The blight phage must create the cube beneath themself.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The blight phage spins and sheds corruptive blight to fill the area, which is treated as if affected by Seeping Blight.
The blight phage chooses three 2 cube areas within 10 squares of the phage. Each area is covered with blight and treated as if affected by Seeping Blight.
While the blight phage is winded, they gain an edge on strikes, and any strike made against them gains an edge.
Any creature within 2 squares of the blight phage can't be hidden from them.
